Software development courses

 

Our training: 90% of practical workshops

We provide trainings with 90 % of practical workshops to ensure that trainees become quickly able to handle with your workflow issues.


 


T

he type of training session you would like, whether it is one-to-one coaching, intercompany or intra-company, we can provide you with. Improve your knowledge thanks to our IT trainings and the know-how of our technical experts recognized unanimously in their business.

We propose a panel of flexible trainings adapted to all your needs. These sessions are conducted by experts who will give you a constructive feedback of their project experiences. Treeptik commits to provide you with a free estimate within 24 hours upon receipt of your request.
